name: L.U.R
description:
This game takes the theme of the Blackthornprod Game Jam 3. Very simple game.

just tap Left,Up,Right or A,W,D (and CTRL for restart) thats all the control

less is more in hire is less control is more harder

: )

download for free just press "Download Now" > "No thannks,just take me to the downloads" > download > play
